Implements reflected object.

Indicates a class need to be reflected. 

Must be added first in class body. \mbox{\Hypertarget{robject_8hpp_a89da187c96d1459452f52e945b2a986e}\label{robject_8hpp_a89da187c96d1459452f52e945b2a986e}}

\index{NCPP\_RCSCOPE@{NCPP\_RCSCOPE}!robject.hpp@{robject.hpp}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{NCPP\_RCSCOPE}{NCPP\_RCSCOPE}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \#define NCPP\+\_\+\+RCSCOPE(\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{Class\+Name }\end{DoxyParamCaption})~        \mbox{\hyperlink{classncpp_1_1rtti_1_1robject__constructor__end__scope}{ncpp\+::rtti\+::robject\+\_\+constructor\+\_\+end\+\_\+scope}} \+\_\+\+\_\+robject\+\_\+constructor\+\_\+end\+\_\+scope\+\_\+\+\_\+($\ast$this, $\ast$(\+\_\+\+\_\+\#\#Class\+Name\#\#\+\_\+constructor\+\_\+begin\+\_\+scope\+\_\+\+\_\+.\+prev\+\_\+robject\+\_\+ref));}



Setups the constructing scope of a reflected class. 

Must be added first in constructor body. \mbox{\Hypertarget{robject_8hpp_aa1ec722378555c397d953512da64a24c}\label{robject_8hpp_aa1ec722378555c397d953512da64a24c}}
